original_text: If they do that, please hear them from your home in heaven. Please answer their prayers and do what is right to help them. Please forgive your people for all the sins that they have done against you.
korean_text: 주는 계신 곳 하늘에서 그들의 기도와 간구를 들으시고 그들의 일을 돌보시오며 주께 범죄한 주의 백성을 용서하옵소서

sentences.original_text: please hear them from your home in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘의 당신의 집에서 그들의 기도를 들어주소서

sentences.original_text: and do what is right to help them
for all the sins that they have done against you
